ygData.messageBody:
Beware:

Is that really a gryf?

GRYFFON claws for damage 54

uh I better run

GRYFFON claws for damage 68
You are stunned!

Where is my drum?

GRYFFON claws for damage 54
You are stunned!

damn! I cant believe I just right clicked

You have forgotten Selo's Accellerando

GRYFFON claws for damage 86
You are stunned!
You are unconcious
You are bleeding to death
You have been slain...

LOADING, PLEASE WAIT...

/shout when did the last boat leave???

Sylly.


-----Original Message-----
From: Firehawk [mailto:firehawk@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 10:08 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard's Instruments

From: "Firehawk" <firehawk@...>

Ummm side note.. as long as you have a drum.. even IF you
bump into a
griffon or a giant you can still out run them.. beware spell
casters
however. or indoor zones.

Adon
